span.span: Welcome to Crowell ISD Home of the Wildcats

span.strong: the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

strong.span: Click the link below for Crowell ISD Superintendent Profile Survey

img.alt: Order o Postponement of May 2 2020 Trustee Election

span.span: School Board Election scheduled for May 2nd has been postponed. This action was prompted by the Governor's orders of limited public assemblies amid concerns of COVID 19.

The new date for the election will be the next general election date of November 3rd. By the Governor's order, all current Board members running for re election will retain their seats until this November election date.
